CustomField.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(Bank_Contract_No_Sell_Execute__c) ,ISBLANK(Transaction_Date_Sell_Execute__c), ISBLANK(Effective_Date_Sell_Execute__c) , ISNULL(Spot_Rate_Sell_Execute__c) ,ISNULL(Total_Execution_Amount__c), (Total_Execution_Amount__c = 0) , ISNULL(Total_Cover_Amount_Contract_Rate__c), (Total_Cover_Amount_Contract_Rate__c = 0) ), false, true)
CustomField.label: Execute Contract Populated
